content: Last legislative assembly of Singapore, 1963-1965This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "3rd Legislative Assembly of Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **3rd Legislative Assembly of Singapore** was a meeting of the [Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore). Its first and only session started on 22 October 1963 and ended on 16 June 1965. The assembly was dissolved on 7 December 1965 and was succeeded by the [1st Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/1st_Parliament_of_Singapore). ## Officeholders - [**Speaker**](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore)**:** - [E. W. Barker](/wiki/E._W._Barker) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) until 30 October 1964 - [A. P. Rajah](/wiki/A._P._Rajah) from 2 November 1964 - **[Deputy Speaker](/wiki/Speaker_of_the_Parliament_of_Singapore#List_of_deputy_speakers):** Fong Kim Heng ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - **[Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore):** [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - [**Deputy Prime Minister**](/wiki/Deputy_Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)**:** [Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - **[Leader of the Opposition](/wiki/Leader_of_the_Opposition_(Singapore)):** Lim Huan Boon ([BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)) - [**Leader of the House**](/wiki/Leader_of_the_House_(Singapore))**:** [Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye) ([PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)) - **[Party Whip of the People's Action Party](/wiki/Party_Whip_of_the_People%27s_Action_Party):** [Chan Chee Seng](/wiki/Chan_Chee_Seng) ## Composition PartyMembersAt [election](/wiki/1963_Singaporean_general_election)At dissolution[People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)37**38**[Barisan Sosialis](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)13**13**[United People's Party](/wiki/United_People%27s_Party_(Singapore))1**0****Total**51**51****Government majority**23**25** ## Members ConstituencyMemberParty[Aljunied](/wiki/Aljunied_Single_Member_Constituency)[S.
